notify.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to formally or officially tell someone about something
notify.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: You will be notified of any changes in the system.
In August we were notified that our article had been rejected.
notify.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to tell someone something officially or formally, usually by writing to them
notify.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The company notified about 110 employees they would lose their jobs because of the planned closure.
Customers affected by this change are being notified of their options by letter.
